title: Order Event - Delivery Method Update
content:
• Home
  • ››Manhattan Active® Omni
  • ››Order Management
  • ››Process & Configuration Guides
  • ››Order Processing
  • ››Order Fulfillment
  • ››Order Events
  • ››Order Event - Delivery Method Update

Delivery Method Update Order Event

Previous I Next

 

  • Order Event Validations
  • Impact on the Order Component
  • Sample Payloads

When a fulfillment outbound message is received for store-initiated buy online pick up at store (BOPIS) to shipment conversion, the order component consumes the message from the Fulfillment Outbound queue and converts the message into Order Event. The Order Event which further updates the order. This order event has no effect on order line status or quantity.

This event is similar to the Fulfilment Update event. Refer here for more details. 

Order Event Validations

Validations performed for this order event are: 

  • EventType should be ”FulfillmentDeliveryMethodUpdated”.
  • ReleaseId is mandatory and should be a valid ReleaseId.
  • DeliveryMethodId should be ShipToAddress.
  • Either ShippingMethodId or (CarrierCode and ServiceLevelCode) is mandatory.

If any of the mandatory parameters are missing or invalid, the order event is not processed and an exception is thrown.

Impact on the Order Component

When the event is processed, order updates are saved. Refer to the DSS initiated Ship it instead guide to understand which order and order line attributes are updated. 

Sample Payloads

Below are sample payloads for the "FulfillmentDeliveryMethodUpdated" event.

Order Event Sample with Shipping Method

{
    "ExternalMessageId": "CC100021",
    "OrderEvent": [
        {
            "ExternalMessageId": "CC100021",
            "EventTypeId": "FulfillmentDeliveryMethodUpdated",
            "OrderId": "CC100021",
            "OrderLineId": "1",
            "ReleaseId": "CC1000211",
            "ReleaseLineId": "1",
            "OrderLine": {
                "DeliveryMethod": {
                    "DeliveryMethodId": "ShipToAddress"
                },
                "ShippingMethodId": "OneDay",
                "ShipToAddress": {
                    "AddressName": "El Paso Texas",
                    "Address": {
                        "Email": "csharma@manh.com",
                        "FirstName": "Chitra",
                        "State": "TX",
                        "Phone": "886-113-5049",
                        "Address2": "San Antonio Ave",
                        "Address3": "#123",
                        "Country": "US",
                        "PostalCode": "79901",
                        "LastName": "Sharma",
                        "Address1": "500 E",
                        "City": "El Paso",
                        "County": "El Paso"
                    }
                }
            },
            "FulfillmentInfo": null
        }
    ]
}

Order Event Sample with Service Level Code and Carrier Code

{
    "ExternalMessageId": "CC100021",
    "OrderEvent": [
        {
            "ExternalMessageId": "CC100021",
            "EventTypeId": "FulfillmentDeliveryMethodUpdated",
            "OrderId": "CC100021",
            "OrderLineId": "1",
            "ReleaseId": "CC1000211",
            "ReleaseLineId": "1",
            "OrderLine": {
                "DeliveryMethod": {
                    "DeliveryMethodId": "ShipToAddress"
                },
                "CarrierCode": "UPS",
                "ServiceLevelCode": "2D",
                "ShipToAddress": {
                    "AddressName": "El Paso Texas",
                    "Address": {
                        "Email": "csharma@manh.com",
                        "FirstName": "Chitra",
                        "State": "TX",
                        "Phone": "886-113-5049",
                        "Address2": "San Antonio Ave",
                        "Address3": "#123",
                        "Country": "US",
                        "PostalCode": "79901",
                        "LastName": "Sharma",
                        "Address1": "500 E",
                        "City": "El Paso",
                        "County": "El Paso"
                    }
                }
            },
            "FulfillmentInfo": null
        }
    ]
}
